scripts.start: cd client_toolchain && npx tsc -p dev_server/ && node dev_server/dist/client_toolchain/dev_server/src/server.js
scripts.dev-deps: (cd client && npm ci); (cd client_toolchain && npm ci);
scripts.prod-deps: (cd client && npm ci --production); (cd client_toolchain && npm ci --production);
scripts.build-stats: cd client_toolchain && npx webpack --config config/webpack.prod.js --progress --profile --json > stats.json
scripts.deploy: npm run prod-deps && npm run build
